name: Magnet
description:
Magnet is a single player game set in a world of magnets. Players must solve physical puzzles and challenges by using magnets to manoeuvring objects, and themselves, through space.

'E' = Pickup objects

'Left Click' = Shoot Blue Magnet

'Right Click' = Shoot Orange Magnet (Levels for these mechanic have not been made of yet so will not work at this time)

'WSAD' = Move

NOTE: Play game with these graphics settings for best effect:

Screen resolution - 1024 X 768 or higher

Graphics quality - Fantastic

Select monitor - Display 1

Windowed - 'Ticked' or 'Not Ticked'

Otherwise you won't be able to see certain particle effects and main menu text

Thanks in advance
